about_the_game:
Recognized for his unparalleled skills in investigating the paranormal, Alex answered Karlheinz Asylum's distress call, sensing it would be a challenging case. The lone path out was imprisoned beneath the terrifying depths of the darkness, buried there. Alex searched the deserted tunnels for all keys to escape. The urge to unravel the asylum's mysteries grew with each step deeper into its enigmatic shadows. The detective followed his gut and moved through physical tension to reveal the secrets that lay beneath.

With the startling realization that the only way to find the elusive keys to liberty was to delve deeper into the darkness, Alex's struggle to escape the asylum's control became more and more passionate as the dreadful reality set in.


  • Explore the haunting corridors and derelict chambers of the forsaken asylum, each room holding secrets and horrors that will send shivers down your spine.
  • Beware of the otherworldly entities that lurk in the shadows, ready to plunge you into madness. Can you outwit and evade these malevolent forces?
  • Dive into a visually stunning environment, heightened by a bone-chilling soundtrack that intensifies the sense of dread and suspense with every step.
  • Your sanity is your lifeline. As you search for the keys to escape, remember that the darkness can consume you, leading to a grisly demise.
